name: Remnants (itch) (BoschyBee)
description:
Awaken, chosen undead, fated to travel throughout these lands in search of the five rulers. Fell each to be granted their powers, but beware of death lurking in the shadows.

A University of Minnesota Video Game Development Club Project 

Themes: Can't Stop/No Stopping, Unconventional Weapons, Copy

        Semester: Spring 2022
